publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3751 Donald Gorrie: Scottish Civic Forum—That the Parliament greatly regrets the winding-up of the Scottish Civic Forum because of the lack of financial support from the Scottish Executive and the Parliament; congratulates the Scottish Civic Forum on the good work it has done to involve more Scottish people in the democratic decision-making process; believes that this work must be continued, and calls on the Executive, the Parliament and those who have been involved in the Scottish Civic Forum, or other organisations working in the same field, to get together to evolve a new mechanism to produce better democratic structures outwith the parliamentary process.
